author: Stergios F. (noreply@blogger.com)
text:
Instagram's new user figures rockets it previous Snapchat, which first championed the 'reviews' structure. — Instagram
Instagram has announced that its "reports" feature has hit over 200 million day by day lively clients, up from 150 million announced in January. 
the new figure catapults Instagram past Snapchat – which first championed the 'stories' structure – which most lately stated 161 million each day active users ahead of its dad or mum business Snap's IPO final month. 
due to the fact Instagram first added "reports" closing August, the influence indicates how positive its parent business, fb, is at replicating and advertising and marketing an attractive layout. 
To coincide with the news, facebook published it's additionally introducing new "decal" equipment for Instagram, together with a function called "Pinning" for stickers and textual content, and placement-certain stickers for users in Chicago, London, Madrid and Tokyo (by the use of diversity). — AFP Relaxnews
